_description: PhoneInfo Scoring Configuration - Adjustable weights and thresholds for name matching

weights._description: How much each name component contributes to the final score
weights._rationale: First name match provides 70% baseline confidence. Last name adds additional 30% when it matches.

match_types._description: Score assigned for each type of match (0-100). Higher = more confidence.

fuzzy_thresholds._description: fuzz.ratio thresholds for classifying fuzzy match quality

risk_tiers._description: Final score ranges mapped to risk decisions

no_match.label: VERY LOW
no_match.action: High risk - likely not the phone owner

bonuses._description: Additional adjustments applied on top of the base score
bonuses._rationale: When both first and last match exactly, or when ME and SYNC agree, confidence increases beyond the weighted sum.

penalties._rationale: First-name-only match (e.g., 'David' is very common) with no last name match is weak evidence.
